CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 54,55 In contrast , PIDT-C12NT based blend film displayed an interpenetrating bicontinuous network between polymer and PC71BM with optimal domain size of 10-20 nm that is pretty favorable for efficient diffusion of excitons to donor - acceptor interface.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PIDT-C12NT: This is the name of the polymer used in the blend film.
2. PC71BM: This is the name of the donor-acceptor material used in the blend film.

Therefore, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| PC71BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 54,55 In contrast , PIDT-C12NT based blend film displayed an interpenetrating bicontinuous network between polymer and PC71BM with optimal domain size of 10-20 nm that is pretty favorable for efficient diffusion of excitons to donor - acceptor interface.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. PIDT-C12NT: This is a polymer entity, which is the name of the polymer used in the blend film.
2. PC71BM: This is also a polymer entity, which is the name of the polymer used as the donor material in the blend film.
3. domain size: This is a property of the blend film, which refers to the size of the domains of the polymer and PC71BM in the interpenetrating bicontinuous network.

So, the Property Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. PC71BM
3. domain size
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the Material Property entities in the paragraph:

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid Material Property entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 54,55 In contrast , PIDT-C12NT based blend film displayed an interpenetrating bicontinuous network between polymer and PC71BM with optimal domain size of 10-20 nm that is pretty favorable for efficient diffusion of excitons to donor - acceptor interface.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Optimal domain size: This is the value of the domain size of the interpenetrating bicontinuous network, which is mentioned as being optimal for efficient diffusion of excitons to the donor-acceptor interface.
2. 10-20 nm: This is the specific value of the domain size mentioned in the paragraph.
3. Polymer: This is the name of the polymer material used in the blend film.
4. PC71BM: This is the name of the donor material used in the blend film.

So, the Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

1. Optimal domain size: 10-20 nm
2. Polymer: Polymer material used in the blend film
3. PC71BM: Donor material used in the blend film
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. Optimal domain size: 10-20 nm (This refers to the size of the domain of the interpenetrating bicontinuous network, which is optimal for efficient diffusion of excitons to the donor-acceptor interface.)
2. Polymer: Polymer material used in the blend film (This refers to the material property of the polymer, which is used in the blend film.)

So, the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

1. Optimal domain size: 10-20 nm
2. Polymer

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Optimal domain size: 10-20 nm |
| Polymer |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
